text:
Thank you for the reply!

Im gonna look into it see if this might help.
Does anyone know if `export_to_template_context` works within sections?

Hello everyone!
I have an email custom module with programmable email option enabled. What I'm trying to accomplish is to format a number property with a dot as thousands separator and comma as decimals separator (e.g. 1.234,56).
I tried a bunch of HubL filters but to no avail.

See the property definition, my sample code and the test email I'm receiving in the attached images.
Anyone can tell me what I'm doing wrong? I mean, the list item NUMBER is the one I'm looking for but it works entering an actual number, not using the property. This is driving me crazy!
Thank you.

<@U049YGVBGBC>
what happens if you name the arguments to the format_currency_value function <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/filters#format-currency-value|as given in this example here>:
`{{contact.arrears_loans|format_currency_value(locale='de-DE', maxDecimalDigits=2)}}`
